title: About Me
description:
I'm a Frontend Developer based in Igualada, Barcelona.
I have been programming in a self-taught manner since I was 15 and I love web and cross-platform technologies.

employment.title: Employment History
employment.trilogi_title: eCommerce Developer at Trilogi - The eCommerce Agency, Igualada
trilogi_list: Implemented tailored web designs from Figma to HTML, CSS and JS.
Worked with PHP template engines such as Twig.
Helped to achieve nice User Experiences translating the designs hand by hand with the designers.
